text: Adenan bin Satem (27 January 1944 - 11 January 2017) was a Malaysian politician. He was the fifth Chief Minister of Sarawak from 1 March 2014 until his death. He was born in Kuching, Sarawak when it was under Japanese rule during World War II. Satem died from a heart attack on 11 January 2017 in Kota Samarahan, Sarawak. He was 72. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Sarawak Category:Malaysian politicians
title: Adenan Satem
